lines.text: Let me teach you the first lesson about these little games. You must try to tell the truth as long as possible. That way, when times change and you have to lie, there is a great chance that you will be believed.
Everyone has a conscience. You don't think so?
Would you say I have a conscience?
Well, perhaps not a very big one.
I belong to a great country and a great socialist movement which one day will be accepted by the whole world.
How could He if He doesn't exist?
